HubSpot's AI Breeze: Free AI Content Creation for Every Marketer

February 5, 2026 • Curated by Chris O'Hara

HubSpot's Breeze Content Agent represents a significant step in democratizing AI for marketers. As a free, AI-powered suite of features, it helps teams plan, create, and share content quickly—including high-quality landing pages, podcasts, case studies, and blogs. For PMMs looking to adopt AI without budget approval, this is an accessible entry point.

SEO-Optimized Content at Scale

What sets Breeze apart is its focus on SEO from the start. The tool creates blog ideas enhanced with SEO data, generates SEO-optimized outlines, and produces content with meta descriptions already optimized. For PMMs juggling multiple product launches and content needs, this means faster time to publication with better search visibility.

The broader HubSpot AI suite gives customer-facing teams all the AI tools needed to boost productivity, scale growth, and unlock actionable insights. Campaign Assistant generates landing pages, marketing emails, and ad copy for Google, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram. With seamless HubSpot integration, new content is instantly set up in your account—speeding up processes that used to require multiple steps and tools.

Source: HubSpot Marketing Blog
